trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element that is associated with this automation peer.
The column that item is in.
Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> object:

`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> is not read-only.

`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> is not part of the row that is a placeholder for a new item in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> object.

`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> can be selected.
`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
An enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
The current object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, `null`.
Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.
Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
The number of columns spanned.
Gets a UI Automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider"></xref> and represents the container of the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A UI Automation provider that implements the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref> and represents the cell or item container.
Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the cell or item.
Gets the number of rows spanned by a cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
The number of rows spanned.
Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
`true` if the element is selected; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Gets the UI Automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref> and acts as the container for the calling object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
The provider that supports <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref>.
Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers representing all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers representing all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider> interface.
`true` if the value is read-only; `false` if it can be modified.
Sets the value of a control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider> interface.
The value to set.
The provider is responsible for converting the value to the appropriate data type.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer"></xref> object is read-only.
Gets the value of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider> interface.
The value of the control as a string.
Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface.
